meanings.definition: An underwater garden or landscape created in an aquarium.
meanings.sent1: The aquascape in the aquarium was filled with colorful plants and rocks.
meanings.sent2: I love watching the fish swim around the aquascape in the tank.
meanings.sent3: The aquascape in the fish tank looked like a tiny underwater forest.
meanings.sent4: Her aquascape was a masterpiece of tranquility in the glass box.
meanings.sent5: The aquascape transformed the aquarium into a mesmerizing underwater world.

meanings.definition: To design or create an underwater garden or landscape in an aquarium.
meanings.sent1: She carefully aquascaped the tank to create a peaceful underwater environment.
meanings.sent2: Aquascaping requires creativity and a good eye for design.
meanings.sent3: He decided to aquascape the aquarium as a surprise for his fish.
meanings.sent4: The way she aquascaped the tank was like painting a picture with water and plants.
meanings.sent5: Aquascaping can turn a plain tank into a vibrant underwater paradise.
